code: import axios from'axios';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';const useEventService=()=>{const{token}=useAuth();const getEvents=async()=>{if(!token){throw new Error('No token available');}const response=await axios.get('https://api.locosporlapromo.com/api/events/',{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return response.data;};return{getEvents};};export default useEventService;
